scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../smart-contracts && npm install && cd ../fabric-simulator && npm install && cd ../oracle-service && npm install

scripts.deploy:vehicle-insurance: cd smart-contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-vehicle-insurance.js --network localhost
